html: Additionally, as the Representative for the largest cotton producing region in the United States, I have concerns about an amendment that, if adopted in the final Farm Bill, would weaken market stability for U.S. cotton producers and manufactures.
text: Additionally, as the Representative for the largest cotton producing region in the United States, I have concerns about an amendment that, if adopted in the final Farm Bill, would weaken market stability for U.S. cotton producers and manufactures.

html: With tremendous growth in our economy and millions of surplus jobs in America, there has never been a better time to promote the dignity of work and self-reliance.

html: Without requiring able-bodied adults to work to receive government assistance, we will continue trapping low-income Americans in a bleak cycle of government dependence and poverty instead of a bright future of prosperity and self-reliance.

html: Today, I introduced, along with my fellow freshmen colleagues @RepBrianFitz , @RepRoKhanna, @RepGallagher, @RepGonzalez, and Rep. Gianforte, a Constitutional amendment to limit the number of terms an individual may serve as a Member of Congress.
